CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 19, 1945, pg. 17, reads: "Fielding Flashes - The youthful Pittsburgh Crawfords... whose total ages average 22 years...  They open the current United States Baseball League season against Oscar Charleston's sensational Brooklyn Brown Dodgers at Forbes Field in a doubleheader Sunday, May 20."
TitMainTitle: Three Pittsburgh Crawfords baseball players in pinstriped uniforms with "V" on sleeve, posed with bats on sandlot playing field
